name: Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel & Spa
address: 1 Vo Thi Sau, Duong Dong, Phú Quốc, Việt Nam
description:
Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel & Spa tọa lạc ở thị trấn Dương Đông, đảo Phú Quốc và sở hữu các phòng nghỉ hiện đại với kết nối WiFi miễn phí. Khách sạn này có hồ bơi ngoài trời cùng nhà hàng, quán bar và chỗ đỗ xe riêng miễn phí trong khuôn viên.

Tât cả các phòng rộng rãi tại đây đều được trang bị máy điều hòa, ghế sofa, tủ quần áo, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng, minibar và ấm đun nước điện. Phòng tắm riêng đi kèm vòi hoa sen hoặc bồn tắm, máy sấy tóc và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí.

Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel & Spa còn có trung tâm spa và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ. Các cơ sở vật chất thiết bị dịch vụ doanh nhân và tổ chức tiệc được bố trí có tính phí.

Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel & Spa cách chùa Sùng Hưng 150 m và Dinh Cậu 400 m. Sân bay quốc tế Phú Quốc cách chỗ nghỉ 6 km.

review.rating: Overall this was an excellent hotel to stay in.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Có Giường Cỡ King Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Beach location was very good.  Location to the town was good. Except outside area with swimming pool. The room was of a high standard. Excellent choice of breakfast to accommodate all. The property was always clean and  tidy. The staff were always courteous.
review.comment_negative:
Disappointed with room service as after ordering a meal, when delivered it was cold. A second attempt of the meal 45 minutes later was still cold.  
It maybe worth pointing out that there is a shortage of sun beds for the amount of guests.

review.rating: Un bruit horrible le soir et la nuit, des travaux et de boîte de nuit au pied de la chambre !!!

review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est d'excellente qualité, très bonnes installations, une super piscine avec débordement sur la mer, un personnel à l'écoute, un super suite, un top petit déjeuner !
review.comment_negative: Les nuisances sonores pendant la nuit ont été terribles ! 2 nuits consécutives de boîte de nuit en rez d'immeuble, la musique, les basses, le micro horriblement fort ! La total ensuite avec les travaux de démontage et de rangement de tout le matériel pendant la nuit ! Les bruits ont été intenables le soir. Cela a tout gâché !

Seems to be mainly Asian guests.

review.rating: 隔音真的不好，但天氣好的時候從陽台往外看還滿美，不過是沒有到wtf那麼美：）
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường cỡ King Nhìn ra Đại dương
review.comment_positive:
位置很好：位於中部，步行到富國夜市大概5分鐘（飯店大門出去後右轉再左轉就可以看到），距離機場搭車10分鐘。
交通服務：可以預約機場接送，但提醒送機時間通常會早2小時左右，不過到機場只要10分鐘車程，如果當天還有行李要收，建議可以抓1.5小時到機場就好，越南盾換算下來也不到150元台幣。
飯店設施：有個人海灘，下午天氣好會有海上活動。游泳池是無邊際，但早上跟傍晚會有很多人在泳池擺拍，不太能游～
spa：因為訂房關係有送三天腳底按摩，需要事先預約時間，但體驗下來真的還不錯，還會送迎賓飲料很好喝！
review.comment_negative:
隔音不佳（完全個人觀點）：我是完全能夠接受在房間還能夠聽到門外走動聲音，也能夠睡著的人。此次指的隔音有三個面向，首先是飯店房間的插頭不知道什麼原因，有些使用轉接頭就是無法插入，晚上我們能夠清楚在床上聽到隔壁房間的人，不停嘗試插插頭的聲音，就像在耳邊一直咚咚咚咚咚的敲擊聲；還有樓上拉椅子的聲音也是一直在，睡到一半會突然被樓上拖椅子聲音吵醒。
再來，雖然有稍微能夠隔音的落地窗，但入住第一天晚上21:00還是非常清楚聽到一樓室外施工的聲音，沒錯！真的就是砂輪機什麼的施工！！！！！
最後是海灘旁的bar，晚餐時段音樂很好聽～但23:30了還是在那邊熱鬧，真的先不要！
因為上述問題我們有和櫃檯反應，禮貌詢問是否能退房，以及了解無法全額退還未住的天數，但討論是否能退款20-30％款項？飯店回應政策問題無法退，並提出換高樓層避開噪音。結果也是往上一層（上面還有一層），然後更靠近沙灘bar的房間（我們原本房間距離沙灘bar更遠），真的不要開玩笑..............我們最後決定剩下兩天晚回住宿並不換房續住，但當天晚上收到櫃檯來電說接收到我們的抱怨，給我們選擇換房只是我們不接受不是他們無所作為，真的是也被氣到回覆這不是解決問題的方式跟態度，如果要這樣就不要再來電強調你們多為我們著想但我們不識相：）
原本沒有想寫出來，但因為想到那通自以為是的電話，讓我決定更改評論真實地寫出我們的體驗，希望對於隔音有要求的人，不會和我們一樣遇到這種事。

櫃檯服務：專業度有但解決問題能力有待加強，最後一天我們個人疏忽遺漏物品在房間，因為對我們很重要，從機場致電飯店請其協助再幫我們確認，是不是真的在房間，一開始飯店一直說確認過了沒有，直到我們不斷堅持請求幫我們再到房間確認看看，真的沒有也沒關係，最後飯店換一個人回訊息告訴我們說有找到了，請我們馬上回飯店拿。因為距離通關與登機時間有點趕，我們沒辦法趕回去，最後請飯店寄送到朋友越南分公司。

review.rating: Cảnh giác với những bất ngờ của khách sạn SEASHELLS
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm của khách sạn là gần chợ đêm Phú Quốc, gần Dinh Cậu, gần chợ Dương Đông. Nhân viên nhà hàng phục vu chu đáo từ nhà hàng đến dịch vụ phòng
review.comment_negative:
1. Lể tân nói với chúng tôi là phòng giường king. Nhưng thật ra là 2 tấm nệm giường đơn ( single mattress ) ghép lại. Chắc có lẻ ̣đây là giường king theo tiêu chuẩn của Việt Nam. Giờ ăn sáng từ 6:30am tới 9:30am, nhà hàng Coral Restaurant thật sự hổn loạn vào bửa ăn sáng. Nếu chúng tôi đến ăn sáng khoảng 9:00am thì chẳng còn gì để ăn.
2. Giá hải sản tại khách sạn SEASHELLS  Phú Quốc rất là cao so với nhà hàng hải sản tại TP Hồ Chí Minh, và còn cao hơn cả giá hải sản của khách sạn Sheraton ở Nha Trang. Chẳng hạn như là giá cua ghẹ trong TP HCM là 1,200,000/kg so với giá cua ghẹ tại khách sạn SEASHELLS là 1,645,000/kg. Bào ngư của khách sạn Sheraton ở Nha Trang là 800,000/kg so với giá của khách sạn SEASHELLS là 1,298,000/kg. Theo chúng tôi biết thì giá tôm hùm luôn cao hơn so với giá tôm tích ( bề bề ). Nhưng ngược lại ở khách sạn SEASHELLS thì giá tôm tích ( bề bề ) 2,510,000/kg cao hơn giá tôm hùm là 2,353,000/kg. Một nhân viên trong nhà hàng Coral Restaurant còn bảo với chúng tôi là gía hải sản ở Phú Quốc cao nhất trên cả nước Việt Nam. Chẳng biết anh ta nói đùa hay cố bào chửa cho việc đội giá của khách sạn.
3. Chúng tôi cảm thấy như bị xem thường từ nhà hàng Coral Restaurant của khách sạn SEASHELLS. Chúng tôi chưa từng thấy một khách sạn nào  trên đất nước Việt Nam lại yêu cầu khách đặt cọc cho một bửa ăn tối, như khách sạn SEASHELLS.
4. Chúng tôi cảm thấy như bị mắc lừa bởi Spa & Beauty Shop của khách sạn SEASHELLS. Tại sảnh lể tân, có tấm biễn quảng cáo là mỗi khách được tặng cho 1 voucher trị giá 200,000 VND. Nhưng sự thật là chúng tôi chỉ được trừ 10%, tổng giá trị. SEASHELLS SPA lấy 5% phí phục vụ, 10% VAT, và 30% SCT mà chúng tôi củng không biết là thuế gì.

review.rating: Pretty good hotel, use the free bus up the island
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Free shuttle bus to/from airport [book ahead]. They've just about got the rooms spot on, [not so sure about the glass bathroom walls]. Hotel is next to harbour/beach & walking distance to the night market. There's also a local free bus service on the main road up the west side of the island, we used this to go a few stops south [out of the town centre] for a better choice of restaurants. Bus also goes to Grandworld, so free half day trip. Big choice on breakfast buffet. Evening bar-b-q looked good [meat as well as seafood]. Remember that UK people don't need visas to go to Phu Quoc [you do for the mainland] but big queue at Immigration at airport,
review.comment_negative:
Arrived just after 12 but were told the room wasn't ready and were made to wait until 250pm, it looked like they don't give you the room until 3pm.
Some of the waiters uniforms could do with updating - old fashioned white polo shirts would look better in a modern colour.
Avoid taxi to Starfish Beach, [SCAM], they take you to a local fishing village and tell you that you have to pay extra to get boat to beach, not true, taxi can take you all the way there. Do use the local minibus tours; they visit most tourist places.

review.comment_negative:
Everything was perfect with our stay at the hotel except for our experience with the hotel's designated tour/day trip driver.

We wanted to book a car/driver to get around to see the rest of the island and the hotel helped us arrange this with their tour partner (or their own service - we couldn't tell). Our experience at the hotel was great until our day trip. We spoke both English and Vietnamese and were very keen on the excursion but found that our driver was unfriendly and didn't seem to want to be there. He mumbled his words and often ignored our requests and questions. The experience totally ruined the hotel's good work.

review.comment_positive: Great views. Great location. Awesome pool with swim-up bar. Super comfortable bed. Surprisingly quiet at night. Staff are all amazingly polite, professional, and friendly. Great buffet breakfast options (Eastern and Western). Only a 5-minute walk to the night market. Family friendly. Couple friendly.
review.comment_negative: A little pricey, but it's a luxury resort, so that's to be expected. And being an upscale resort, there are some entitled guests that come there and are unnecessarily rude to staff for things that are out of the staff's control (and the staff were all very polite and professional in response)... but those guests' behavior is not the hotel's fault. My advice: don't be those rude guests; you're on vacation after all. Go relax by the pool 😉.

review.rating: 우리가촉 모두 만족한 너무 좋았던 리조트!
review.room_type: Suite Phu Quoc Với 1 Lần Mát-xa Toàn Thân (40 Phút) Cho 4 Khách
review.comment_positive:
위치가 야시장 바로 건너편이라 너무편하게 이용했다. 그리고 바로 눈앞에서 펼쳐지는 섯셋은 정말 황홀할정도.
꼭 씨뷰룸을 선택하세요. 
직원응대도 괜찮았고 조식도 괜찮았다. 
방도 깨끗하고 시설도 너무 좋았다.  샤워실에있던 아로마소금?을 잊을수없다. 
샴푸나 바디클렌져의 향기도 굿~~~^^
수영장이 넓고 깊어 세 아이들이 굉장히 재미있어했다. 
덕분에 아이들의 수영실력이 더 늘었다. ^^ 깊이가 130~140센치정도 되었던것같다.  어린 아이들을 위한 수영장도 옆에 작게 있고 구명조끼도 언제든 사용할 수 있어 필요한 사람은 사용하면된다. 
바다가 바로 앞이라 바다와 수영장을 번갈아 마음껏 즐길수있다. 그리고 바다가 너무 깨끗했다. 물놀이를 좋아하는 나는 200프로 이상 만족하였다. 푸꾸옥을 다시온다면 재방문의사 100프로. 
그리고 서비스로 주는 전신맛사지쿠폰으로 숙소에서 지내는 이틀동안 피로를 풀수있었다.
우리가족 모두 너무만족한 숙소이다. 너무 최고!
review.comment_negative: 이번 여행에 푸꾸옥에서 세군데 방을 이용했다. 여기뿐아니라 다른곳들도 룸에서 개미가 많이보였다. 푸꼭 전반적으로 룸 방역에 좀 더 신경을 쓰면 훨씬 쾌적한 호텔들이 될것같다.

review.comment_negative:
Bữa tối sinh nhật dùng tại nhà hàng view hồ hơi thì khá nhiều muỗi. 😞
Bữa ăn gồm 5 món (món khai vị, súp, salad, món chính và tráng miệng) món nào ăn cũng khá vừa miệng, riêng món chính tôi chọn dạng Steak thì bò rất khá cứng (mặc dù tôi đã chọn medium well, phần còn lại là medium) , cả 2 phần đều như vậy. Tôi đã bỏ lại vì không ăn được😔😔

Tôi có gọi thêm 2 phần nước thì nhà hàng có mời nên tôi không phải thanh toán khoản nước gọi thêm, nhưng vì là ngày sinh nhật, món ăn chính lại không được ngon, muỗi khá nhiều nên tôi cảm thấy thất vọng.

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
1.Абсолютно потрясающая зона бассейна с видом прямо на закат
2.Красивый номер classic sea view, особенно зона ванной со стеклянными стенами
3.Очень дружелюбный персонал, высококлассный сервис
4.Хорошее расположение отеля прямо на Long Beach, рядом много кафе, магазинов, обмен валюты, салонов массажа. До ночного рынка - 5 мин.пешком
review.comment_negative:
1.Слишком раннее время завтрака с 6.30 до 9.30.  Все же в отпуске хочется выспаться
2.Курс обмена валюты в отеле сильно отличается в невыгодную сторону  от курса обмена в ювелирных магазинах (на 150 тыс.донгов со 100 долларов)
3.Цены в ресторане и баре указаны без налога и сервисного сбора, в итоге к счету прибавляется процентов 40. Комфортнее, когда сразу указана полная цена
4.Это не относится к отелю, но пляж Long Beach довольно грязный. гулять вдоль береговой линии неприятно - везде валяется мусор и пластик

review.room_type: Suite Junior 1 Phòng Ngủ Với 1 Lần Mát-Xa Chân (15 Phút) Cho 2 Khách
review.comment_positive:
After staying at 3 other places in Phu Quoc from budget to top of the range, I couldn't have been happier with Seashells.
Firstly, it's in a great location across the road from shops and the night market, then there was the room which was fabulous and had brilliant air-conditioning almost too cold with 2 TV's and a nice balcony.
Then there was the food the best we have had at any resort and much cheaper than most.
The infinity pool with an actual pool bar was beautiful and the water was nice and warm and overlooking the beach.
The spa services, unlike most resorts, were also priced so well, $1500 for 2 people for an hour body massage complete with welcoming drink and also a departing drink with ginger dried fruit.
The staff were great. Some weren't great with English, but they always got a person who was without us asking if they had trouble, instead of guessing what we wanted like some do.
I wasn't expecting this resort to be as nice as it was and so happy we found it sadly only for 3 days, and I wish we had spent the entire time there.
Congratulations to the manager and thanks to all the staff from the bar to the cleaners, highly recommend.

review.comment_negative:
Das Frühstück  war die reinste Katastrophe .
Jeden !!Tag das selbe Zeug . Das Gebratene schwamm im Fett und hatte entweder keinen Geschmack oder war übersalzen Ab dem 3. Tag bin ich zum Markt gegangen und  habe  dort gefrühstückt .Die Säfte  in diesem Hotel waren eine Zumutung und ist vergleichbar mit einem Chemielabor.
Alles aus der Tüte und nix Frisches!!
Das Geschirr wurde nie rechtzeitig abgeräumt, weil es zu wenig
Personal gab. Die, die da waren haben aber ihr Bestes gegeben.
Das einzige Gute an diesem Hotel ist die sehr gute Lage.
Daher kann ich all die guten Bewertungen auf diese und ähnliche Seiten nicht teilen.
Das Hotel hier wird in seiner jetzigen Form nicht lange bestehen können.

review.comment_positive:
the pool is HUGE and very pretty
the pool bar food & drinks are quite good (the pizza actually tastes like pizza with proper cheese!)
they had the best breakfast of all of our hotel stays in Vietnam 
the rooms were lovely and the balcony view of the pool was great
the location was good for the night market and exploring the island if you have a scooter 
the hotel is modern and shiny and the air conditioning works really well (just not in the hallways etc which was a bit frustrating)
review.comment_negative:
the staff were a mixed bag, without generalising we found the ladies to be lovely and friendly but two of the male staff let us down. one yelled at us for taking pool towels up to our room and was quite rude, the other one at check in/out was quite unfriendly and hard to communicate with. he yelled at us to wait while the room was checked once we checked out, which is fine and common in Vietnam, but he never bothered to let us know all was okay, and left us waiting while we had a flight to catch, until we tracked down a female staff member who was lovely and told us all was okay and we could go

this let them down and I wouldn’t say it’s on par with a true 5 star hotel. also they WILL go in and clean your room even if you put the ‘do not disturb’ sign up, it’s totally redundant, and again I don’t think this is 5 star hotel service.

review.comment_positive: Very good swimming pool area and the hotel provides airport transfer. Comfy rooms and beds and really close to the port and night market. Very clean an cosy rooms.
review.comment_negative: Some minor elements could be improved, for example, the quality of breakfast - the Sunday breakfast seemed less fresh than on the other days. And coffee - they provided only with added sugar. When I asked for extra non-sugar coffee (I wanted to pay additionally), the staff gave me the lecture on how the coffee with sugar is better than the normal one... bizarre. Anyway, great stay, but sometimes you shouldn't treat your guests as idiots.

review.rating: Really enjoyable stay. Location is ideal. Great value. Just a bit more TLC would make it a 9+ score
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Location is great. A few minutes walk from the night market and many stores and restaurants.
Right on the beach. Beach is very small because water comes almost up to the wall. But great sand and lots of shells (per the name!) to entertain little ones. We went a little to the left and had the place to ourselves on two separate days.
Pool looks great, infinity style overlooking the sea and not busy but quite chilly.
Good selection at breakfast. Tasty pool bar burgers.
Decent rooms. Modern with smart tv. Friendly staff.
Really good value.
Might go back for few days at the end of our trip
review.comment_negative:
Pool always cold.
Beach not really well looked after. The steps by the shower area are tricky and dangerous. Would cost almost nothing to sort. Amazed that they haven't done this.
Not many food options but not really a problem due to location
Its a great hotel for the price and we loved the location. It just feels as though a bit of TLC here and there would make it that much personable.

review.comment_positive: Prachtig hotel met fijn strand en zwembad. Grote ruime kamer met fantastisch uitzicht. Ontbijt was enorm uitgebreid en van zeer goede kwaliteit. Alhoewel het druk was bij het ontbijt was er altijd een tafel vrij, zowel binnen als buiten op het terras. De locatie van Seashells is lekker centraal, maar 5 minuten lopen van de nightmarket .
review.comment_negative: Twee keer bleek onze kamer nadat housekeeping geweest was niet correct afgesloten, de deur stond gewoon op een kier ! Maar geen woorden aan vuil gemaakt omdat we niets minsten en de hardwerkende dames niet in de problemen wilden brengen.

review.comment_positive: Địa điểm ngay trung tâm thuận tiện đi lại. Phòng sạch sẽ rộng, Ban công siêu to bự giúp không gian thoáng, Mình đi nhóm phòng gia đình nên rất ok . Phòng ở gốc sẽ có cả View biển vs city ở 2 mặt rất ok
review.comment_negative:
1- Cực kỳ thiếu nhân viên dọn dọn dĩa dơ tại khu vực ăn sáng, nv đã thiếu nhưng cảm giác họ không được trainning để làm việc nhanh nhẹn, khách thì đợi cứ đợi, làm vẫn cứ tự từ, thậm chí k muốn nói là lề mề, mà ai cũng vậy. Tôi ở vào sáng thứ 2 mà có nhiều bạn khách phải để dĩa dơ của khách trước đó ra 1 góc trên bàn rùi ngồi ăn đỡ (do k làm vậy thì k có bàn khác để ngồi) ăn xong luôn vẫn k có nv nào dọn, mặc dù có nhiều lượt nv đi ngang qua. Không hỗ trợ xe đầy đĩa dơ cho nv, 1 lần  chỉ cầm dc vài dĩa đi dọn. 
2- Kv lễ tân nv lễ tân thì tán dóc vs hướng dẫn viên, mặc dù ở phía sau còn khách đợi. Ngay kv lễ tân nv để đồ cá nhân ly cf, tô ăn sáng... nhìn phản cảm, k phù hợp ở 1 ks 4 5 sao. 
3- Phòng tôi thiếu 1  bộ dép, bàn chải và kem đánh răng và khăn, gọi lễ tân 2 lần để giục vậy mà vẫn mang thiếu, chỉ mang dc kem đánh và khăn. 
4- Không tin được là ks 5 sao mà wellcome drink không hề có, k phục vụ thì cũng không hề có 1 quày nước wellcome drink để khách tự phục vụ luôn. Trong khi rất nhiều ks 4 sao thôi đã có và cả check in, check out tại bàn chờ trong sãnh, chứ k có bắt khách đứng xếp hàng đến lượt ngay lễ tân (nếu đông)

review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Были в этом отеле второй раз. Удачное расположение отеля: в пешей доступности ночной рынок, множество ресторанов и кафе (недалеко русское кафе), массажные салоны. Купаться можно и в бассейне, и в море. Вода в море была чистая и теплая, выходить из воды не хотелось! До аэропорта 15 минут на такси или на автобусе (отель предоставляет трансфер). Единственное замечание - не хватает лежаков во второй половине дня, У нас был номер с видом на море и мы каждый вечер любовались закатом. Это просто великолепно!

review.rating: Not the quality you expect. But with a great location
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The location is great! Situated right at the beach and nearby the night market. The staff kept the toilets near the swimming pool super clean! This really was remarkable.
review.comment_negative:
At the check-in we had to give a deposit for the stay. This wasn’t communicated. 
The hotelbed was big, but really uncomfortable. You could feel the springs in the matras and it was just 2 big beds put next to each other. In the middle you could feel the wooden edge.
Then with checkout we received a letter the night before with all the options etc for checkout. Also we had the option for a late checkout. We wanted to have that later checkout. Only in the morning they receptionist told us this wasn’t possible because they where fully booked.
last but not least we got sick after having our breakfast here. All together, we had fun doing nothing in Phu Quoc but we think that for this money you have better options

review.rating: Seashells Hotel .... Great peopl, Great place!!
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel & Spa is an excellent hotel, and a great choice for tourism, business, events and as a central location for island discovery. 
The hotel staff are the real asset here, and are all so friendly and helpful, and that goes from the restaurant to the front desk, cleaners and concierge.
Having a great location in Phu Quoc town and still being on the beach, allows for an easy walk to the Night Market and the plethora of local restaurants in the vicinity.
We visited mainly for a friends wedding, which the hotel catered for exceptionally well and made this special event even more special for everyone.
Well done Seashells!!

review.comment_positive: Everything about this place is amazing. The buffet breakfast was great with a large range of choices. We highly recommend also the seafood buffet dinner. Rooms were huge, with amazing views, great room service, comfortable beds, modern facilities. Infinity pool and private beach were a highlight of our stay. Location was super convenient, with the hotel being located within walking distance to any places that need to be visited including dinh cau jetty, tourist information and booking offices, the Phu Quoc night markets, cafes and other tourist attractions. Finally, the staff made our stay memorable, their kind, helpful and attentive service is something we will remember and recommend to everyone who is looking to stay at phu quoc. Airport shuttle service is super convenient too - recommend booking this in advance, the hotel will send a message about it when you book.

review.comment_negative: The pool, although was nice did not have enough open chairs. The beach, although the water looked clear and maybe clean was littered with trash. This seems to be common amongst all the beaches we visited. Quite sad that the island is treated like a trash facility by the inhabitants. That was the single most disappointing thing on the whole trip.

review.rating: Excellent location on the ocean offering superior service!
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel and Spa is absolutely spectacular. It is positioned right on the beach. With infinity pools out to the ocean and the sunset. 
From the moment you arrive at the front door, from reception to being taken to your room, to dining in the restaurant or by the pool or drinking at the pool bar, it’s just luxury. 
I was very impressed with the way the hotel  cares for the environment with refillable hand wash, hair shampoo and conditioner to offering hats and a hessian bag to use for your stay! 
The staff all offer the highest level of service and are dressed to impress and impress they certainly know how! 
So many choices from swimming in the pool,  the ocean to taking out a canoe or just sitting at the pool bar, this hotel has it all! 
A free airport shuttle bus is also available! 
I wish to highly recommend the Seashells Phu Quoc Hotel & Spa! 10/10!

review.rating: Très agréable mais bémols à revoir
review.room_type: Phòng Cổ Điển Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Les managers et personnel du petit-déjeuner sont très sympathiques. Mais, Mention Exceptionnelle, pour le manager Chi Tâm, il a été vraiment aux petits soins et très réceptif de nos remarques constructives. Il survole son niveau et il a de l'allure pour un hôtel haut de gamme.
Piscine, chambre, sauna, hammam et spa sont classes et vraiment très agréables
review.comment_negative:
Le personnel de la piscine n'est pas de niveau d'un hôtel haut gamme. ils ont un laisser-aller indigne du lieu, laissant la clientèle livrée à eux-mêmes, sans proposer de parasole, de serviettes...etc 
Mention intolérable pour la direction: Effectivement, il a été ordonné au personnel de l'accueil, pour le change, de refuser tout billet d'euro ou dollar très légèrement froissé ou mouillé, il doit être nickel.
Pour un hôtel 5 étoiles, refuser de l'espèce de sa clientèle, c'est invraisemblable, tout simplement indigne.
